image
template.value: <graphic> <ImageView> <Image url="@/$imgPath$.$imgExtension$"/> </ImageView> </graphic>

template.name: radio-button-group
template.value: <fx:define> <ToggleGroup fx:id="$groupName$"/> </fx:define> <RadioButton GridPane.rowIndex="0" GridPane.columnIndex="2" text="red" toggleGroup="$$$groupName$"/> <RadioButton GridPane.rowIndex="0" GridPane.columnIndex="3" text="green" toggleGroup="$$$groupName$"/> <RadioButton selected="true" GridPane.rowIndex="0" GridPane.columnIndex="4" text="blue" toggleGroup="$$$groupName$"/>

template.name: combobox
template.value: <?import javafx.collections.*?> <?import java.lang.String?> <ComboBox editable="false" GridPane.rowIndex="3" GridPane.columnIndex="0"> <items> <FXCollections fx:factory="observableArrayList"> <String fx:value="Option 1"/> <String fx:value="Option 2"/> <String fx:value="Option 3"/> <String fx:value="Option 4"/> <String fx:value="Option 5"/> </FXCollections> </items> <value> <String fx:value="This is Default Option"/> </value> </ComboBox>

template.name: slider
template.value: <Slider orientation="VERTICAL" GridPane.rowIndex="4" GridPane.columnIndex="1" GridPane.columnSpan="2" min="0" max="100" showTickMarks="true" showTickLabels="true" minorTickCount="4" snapToTicks="true"/>

template.name: spinner
template.value: <Spinner editable="true" GridPane.columnSpan="2" GridPane.rowIndex="5" min="0" max="100" initialValue="50"/>

template.name: Accordion
template.value: <Accordion GridPane.columnIndex="0" GridPane.rowIndex="7" expandedPane="$pane3" > <panes> <TitledPane text="Title Pane 1"> <Label>THis is a title pane</Label> </TitledPane> <TitledPane text="Title Pane 2"> <Label>THis is a title pane</Label> </TitledPane> <TitledPane fx:id="pane3" text="Title Pane 3"> <Label>THis is a title pane</Label> </TitledPane> </panes> </Accordion>
template.description: Accordion (Only one thing open at a time
